name: Cyber Escape (itch) (sgtwombatstudios)
description:
In the near future...robots keep humans as pets! Work as a team in this two player game, and help your human escape the city to live free. One player controls the human (WASD), and the other player controls the robot (arrow keys + spacebar).

Pressing the spacebar will cause the robot to shoot a laser beam that will rise up as a platform for the human to jump on. The platform will be be destroyed if it hits a rooftop, so be sure to fire the laser in a clear area.

Or, play as a one player game if you are feeling confident :)
